issue.title: scene_info does not reflect older changes to visuals

content.raw:
Dear Nathan, if I understand correctly your answer there is currently no way to retrieve the actual color of a visual if it has changed before the new client connects to gzserver. And this is so because updates are missing in Link.cc. Am I right?

This is also my feeling that such updates are missing (no actual change for visuals_M ever happens). And I was considering, as a possible fix, a subscription to the ~/visual topic in World::Load() with an appropriate callback. This would avoid the use of the ~/model/modify topic and let model/link updates ignore visual as they currently do. 

But there is something that worries me and seems to be a concern for the authors of gazebo/physics: several comments indicate that visual updates  shouldn't be managed from within the physics namespace (see e.g., Link.cc at line 1036).

So what should be the ultimate fix: a visual plugin based on the rendering?
Best regards,
Luc
